Different Crime.Crime Name: Procedural fairness breach in immigration process

procedural_fairness: failure to comply without reasonable excuse may constitute an abuse of process
decision_reasoning: Eight plaintiffs missed the November 1, 2004, deadline for written discovery answers. Despite extensions and reminders, no substantial justification or assurance of compliance was provided. The delay impacted case progression and fairness to defendants.
application_details: Defendants moved to strike claims of defaulting plaintiffs or extend timelines. Prothonotary reviewed arguments and evidence before deciding.
result_of_case: Claims of eight plaintiffs were dismissed, and costs awarded to defendants.
